column4: but otw, the hardware is fully supported (if it's still stock)
yeah, I'm running debian ppc on my g/f's G3 ibook, using xfce4 to speed things up a bit, and it's not bad at all.
ive not had a problem running ubuntu-gnome on my G3 ibook (way faster than the stock OS)
I just did a base install, so I didn't get the opportunity to try gnome, but it's nice to hear that it is functional.
